verbose_text: We found that several genes are down-regulated, including BNIP3, DAPK1, p21, BCL10, CASP8, CASP10, and BNIP3L (XREF_FIG), which cause cell cycle arrest, inhibit proliferation, and promote apoptosis.
evidence: BNIP3, DAPK1, p21, BCL10, CASP8, CASP10, and BNIP3L ( XREF_FIG ), which cause cell cycle arrest, inhibit proliferation, and promote apoptosis
